publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3501# Shona Robison: Asylum Seekers and Health-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of Asylum seekers: meeting their healthcare needs by the British Medical Association; recognises the findings of the report, in particular that the health of asylum seekers may actually deteriorate after entry to the UK, and considers that the Scottish Executive should allocate sufficient funding and implement effective policies to promote the health of this minority group. Supported by: Michael Russell*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3501# Shona Robison: Asylum Seekers and Health-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of Asylum seekers: meeting their healthcare needs by the British Medical Association; recognises the findings of the report, in particular that the health of asylum seekers may actually deteriorate after entry to the UK, and considers that the Scottish Executive should allocate sufficient funding and implement effective policies to promote the health of this minority group. Supported by: Michael Russell, Mr Andrew Welsh, Roseanna Cunningham, Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Christine Grahame*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3501# Asylum Seekers and Health (lodged on 24 October 2002) Elaine Smith*
